items.title: Wrestling Season Opener at Cal Poly
items.summary: #22 Purdue corralled the Mustangs in Cal Poly's home gym.

items.title: #22 Boilers Corral Mustangs to Open Season
items.summary: Purdue starts 1-0 with a 19-13 win at Cal Poly.

items.title: Boilers Fall on Saturday Night to #21 Michigan
items.summary: Purdue Football dropped its Saturday night clash at No. 21 Michigan, 21-16, in a hard-fought effort against its third ranked opponent of the season.

items.title: Purdue Wins 28 Events, Sweeps Triple Dual
items.summary: Five Boilermakers won multiple individual events and Biko Hooper-Haviland eclipsed a freshman record in the 200 fly that had stood since 2011.

Buckeridge, Walker Earn All-Big Ten Honors at Big Ten Championships
items.summary: Purdue Cross Country opened the postseason at the Big Ten Championships on Friday where Douglas Buckeridge earned First Team All-Big Ten and Nathan Walker Earned Second Team All-Big Ten.

items.title: Purdue Men’s Basketball vs. UIndy Highlights
Kaufman-Renn, Smith Named to NABC Player of the Year Watch List
items.summary: Purdue is the only school with two players on NABC POY watch list.

items.title: The Gold Scripts
items.summary: The second uniform in Purdue's 2025-26 set to drop is the Gold Script, which will make their debut in the season opener on Monday, Nov. 3.

items.title: #1 Purdue Rolls Past UIndy in Final Exhibition Tuneup
items.summary: No. 1-ranked Purdue cruised past UIndy at Mackey Arena in the Boilermakers' final tuneup before the regular-season opener on Nov. 4.

Purdue Set to Host Big Ten Tournament at Folk Field
items.summary: Purdue is hosting the 2025 Big Ten Women’s Soccer Tournament at Folk Field beginning tomorrow, Oct. 30 and running through Nov. 2.

items.summary: The Boilermakers welcomed fans of all ages to Alexander Field for the annual Halloween Bash.
